name: Ian Simulator DX - The Demo
description:
IAN SIMULATOR DX... what is it?

Ian Simulator DX is a "remake" of an unreleased demo of a game that I made months ago... Follow Ian as you gather your team to face off against the big bad to potentially "SAVE the WORLD"...

!! This is a DEMO, not the full release !!

Please check out the full version of the game when it's released.

https://grilledcheesegames.itch.io/iansimulatordx

!! This is also an earlier build of the game, some things may NOT be finalized yet. Please leave a comment if you encounter any game-breaking bugs !!
